name: The Moonstone temple
description:
You have been sent by the Sun godess to the Moonstone temple.   -------------------------- Description     With your magic bow in hand, find the artifact that hides at the   end of the temple. -------------------------- Features
  • Indie game!
  • dungeon crawler and puzzle game!
  • Original soundtrack!
-------------------------- Controls
  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys´
  • Interact - "Z"
  • Shoot - "X"
-------------------------- Credits

Guilherme Silva
